attributes.action: David Cameron to stay as PM.
attributes.additional_details: Jeremy Corbyn has slyly managed to cause controversy by demanding the PM publicly release his tax affairs and putting pressure on him to resign. No doubt this is because he anticipates that this will be beneficial for the Labour party gaining control in the near future NOT that he is doing the country some kind of a favour. David Cameron should not resign. It's time the people supported our PM instead of constant criticisms.
attributes.background: It's about time David Cameron got some support from his country. It's no easy job being PM. Not all choices benefit all people but decisions have to be made and he makes decisions with the country as a whole in mind. ...

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to remain as Prime Minister is a decision for the Prime Minister,  not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
